attributes.action: The Road Tax to be used for Road Repairs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Road Tax to be used by the Highways Agency to repair road properly, instead of patchy repairs of potholes at present. Resurfacing of the roads, utility companies to liaise with the Highways Agency so they do not dig up newly resurfaced roads in a matter of days/weeks of repairs.
